about.title: Company
about.description: We are engaged in technological development and programming of a series of mobile robots. Our team has more than 10 years of research and development experience in the industry, with a focus on the design of wired intelligent robots, intelligent motion control and independent innovative technologies for indoor and outdoor scenarios.
about.range: Our product range covers standard platforms of new power-driven vehicles, advanced unmanned robots, intelligent robotic inspectors, autonomous delivery robots and unmanned vehicles (UGVs) for industrial transportation.
about.applications: These technologies are widely used in various fields such as education, inspection, manufacturing plants and parking space distribution. Not only do we provide standard products, but we also develop customized innovative solutions based on robot operating systems to meet a variety of practical customer needs.

specifications.fullName: GT-01 U300 Intelligent Following Tracked Transporter
specifications.typeCategory: A caterpillar robot with automatic follow-up function

contacts.companyName: Comet Forward Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd.
contacts.companyDescription: Founded in 2023, Comet Forward Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. is engaged in technological development and programming of a series of mobile robots. Our team has more than 10 years of research and development experience in the industry, with a focus on the design of wired intelligent robots, intelligent motion control and independent innovative technologies for indoor and outdoor scenarios. Our product range covers standard platforms of new power-driven vehicles, advanced unmanned robots, intelligent robotic inspectors, autonomous delivery robots and unmanned vehicles for industrial transportation. These technologies are widely used in various fields such as education, inspection, manufacturing plants and parking space distribution. Not only do we provide standard products, but we also develop customized innovative solutions based on robot operating systems to meet a variety of practical customer needs.
